name: NARUTO Powerful Shippuden
description:
Naruto And Lee Like You’ve Never Seen Before!

Naruto Powerful Shippuden mixes together NARUTO Spin‐Off: Rock Lee and his ninja pals and Naruto Shippuden official storyline into a full SD game full of crazy off‐beat humor. Experience the most atypical Naruto video game in years with 200% fun and 2 refreshing storylines.

Features:

-Approved by Guy

-NARUTO Spin‐Off: Rock Lee and his ninja pals universe: Play wild in Lee’s raving universe discovering Naruto’s universe like you never suspected it

-2 playable characters / 2 super deformed storyline: Play both as Lee and Naruto and explore their own adventures, including NARUTO Spin‐Off: Rock Lee and ninja pals storyline and for the first time Naruto Shippuden storyline in a super deformed universe as well.

-All NARUTO techniques: Naruto’s most ultimate techniques and Lee’s most... different ones to unlock

-2D side scrolling Naruto action: All NARUTO action packed into a 2D sidescrolling action game.
